translations.Component.ConfirmBeforeSubmit.Content: The request will be processed if you decide to confirm.
translations.Component.ConfirmBeforeSubmit.Title: Confirmation required
translations.Component.GiveFeedback.Share: Share feedback with your colleague's manager
translations.Component.GiveFeedbackDetails.NegativeFe: Last week, you worked on the same subject for 5 days without asking for help. It turned out you were stuck. It annoyed me that you didn't ask us for help. I'd like you to come and see us next time, so you don't get stuck for so long.
translations.Component.GiveFeedbackDetails.PositiveFe: Your colleagues often come to you for help. You take the time to explain things to them until they understand. I think you're very good at listening to your colleagues and helping them to improve their skills. Bravo and thank you for that.
translations.Component.GiveFeedbackSuccess.Title: FeedZback sent to:
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedback.Message1: You are replying to the feedback request sent to you by
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedback.Message2: Note that your feedback will be shared with his manager.
translations.Component.GiveRequestedFeedbackListEmpty: You have no feedZback requests to process...
Take this opportunity to request or give feedZback to your colleagues!
translations.Component.LeaveForm.Content: Changes you made will be lost if you decide to continue.
translations.Component.LeaveForm.Title: Unsaved changes
translations.Component.PendingFeedback.ReminderAlread: You have already reminded your colleague on
translations.Component.PendingFeedback.ReminderSent: A reminder has been sent to your colleague.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.EmailsRequirem: Use your colleagues' personal email addresses (avoid mailing lists).
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.Error: An error occurred when sending to:
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.Success: Your request has been sent to:
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.TemplateAssign:
Hello,
As you know, my assignment is coming to an end soon and I would like to have your feedback on my performance.
Thank you in advance.
translations.Component.RequestFeedback.TemplateEvalua:
Hello,
I'm about to have my annual performance review and to prepare for it I'd like to have your feedback on what I'm doing well and what I could improve.
Thanks in advance.
translations.Component.RequestFeedbackSuccess.Title: FeedZback requested from:
translations.Message.ConfirmBeforeSubmitFeedback: Once confirmed, your feedZback cannot be modified.
translations.Message.FeedbackIsSharedWithTheManagerOf: This feedZback is shared with the manager of your colleague
translations.Message.FeedbackIsSharedWithYourManager: This feedZback is shared with your manager
translations.Message.InvalidEmailPlural: {VAR_PLURAL, plural, =one {The following email address is invalid:} =other {The following email addresses are invalid:}}
translations.Message.ShareFeedbackContent: Sharing feedZback is part of Zenika's continuous improvement approach, which places its recipient at the centre of discussions.
translations.PageNotFound.Title: Page not found
translations.Title.AppTagline: Request and give feedback to your colleagues
